doctor.name: Dr. Jasmin Begum
doctor.info: Dr. Jasmin Begum is a Surgery Specialist in Chittagong. Her qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Surgery). She is a Consultant, Surgery at Chattogram Maa-O-Shishu Hospital Medical College. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Max Hospital & Diagnostic, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Jasmin Begum at Max Hospital & Diagnostic, Chittagong is 7pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
